nodes.text: The GAT-12i "Skipray" was part of the GAT Blastboat series produced by Sienar Fleet Systems.

The GAT-12i "Skipray" was a twenty-five meter long blastboat, equipped with a Class 2 hyperdrive and a navigation computer limited to four hyperspace jumps. The GAT-12i was capable of reaching speeds of 1,200 kilometers an hour in atmosphere.
It required a crew of four and was armed with an impressive array of weaponry, including three medium ion cannons, two laser cannons, a proton torpedo launcher, and a concussion missile launcher.
The GAT-12i "Skipray" was one of the most popular version of the GAT-12 Skipray Blastboats, produced by Sienar Fleet Systems in service to the Galactic Empire.
The GAT-12i was an early successor of the GAT-12h but the Empire purchased a limited amount only, using them in a few local zones.
